00088 class AuthenticationServer {
00089         private:
00090                 set<string> userfields;
00091                 static const int BufferSize = 1024;
00092                 static const int ResultSize = 6;
00093                 static const int ASPort = 8183;
00094                 PresentationContext *pctx;
00095                 IContextManager* ctxm;

00099                 void tokenize(const std::string& str, 
00100                               std::vector<std::string>& tokens,
00101                               const std::string& delimiters = " ")
00102                 {
00103                         std::string::size_type lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, 0);
00104                         std::string::size_type pos     = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00105                         while (std::string::npos != pos || std::string::npos != lastPos) {
00106                                 tokens.push_back(str.substr(lastPos, pos - lastPos));
00107                                 lastPos = str.find_first_not_of(delimiters, pos);
00108                                 pos = str.find_first_of(delimiters, lastPos);
00109                         }
00110                 };
00111                 IGingaUser *getGingaUser(string login, string passw);
00112                 bool setUserProperty(IGingaUser *u, string passwd, string p, string v);
00113                 bool getUserProperty(IGingaUser *u, string passwd, string p, string &v);
00114                 void processClient(int new_socket);
00115                 const char *addUser(int csocket, string passwd, string name, string age, string location, string gender);
00116                 const char *removeUser(int csocket, string userid, string passwd);
00117                 const char *updateUser(int csocket, string userid, string passwd, string property, string value);
00118                 const char *queryUser(int csocket, string userid, string passwd, string property);
00119                 const char *login(int csocket, string userid, string passwd);
00120                 const char *logout(int csocket, string userid, string passwd);
00121                 const char *getCurrentUser(int csocket);
00122                 const char *listUsers(int csocket);
00123 #ifdef HAVE_PROFILEMONITOR
00124                 const char *debug(int csocket);
00125 #endif
00126                 const char *showVar(int csocket, string userid, string passwd, string property);
00127                 const char *updateVar(int csocket, string userid, string passwd, string property, string value);
00128                 void saveUser (int uid);
00129 
00130         public:
00131                 AuthenticationServer(PresentationContext *pctx);
00132

00135 
00136 };
